resources.string:
You are very underweight! 

 BMI: 16 to 16.9 kg/m2 

 Possible symptoms: Hair loss, infertility, menstrual absence

You are underweight! 

 BMI: 17 to 18.4 kg/m2 

 Possible symptoms: Fatigue, stress, anxiety

You are at the perfect weight! 

 BMI: 18.5 to 24.9 kg/m2 

 Positives: Lower risk of heart and vascular disease

" Are you overweight! 

 BMI: 25 to 29.9 kg/m2 

 Possible symptoms: Fatigue, poor circulation, varicose veins"

Grade I obesity status! 

 BMI: 30 to 34.9 kg/m2 

 Possible symptoms: Diabetes, angina, heart attack, atherosclerosis

Grade II obesity status! 

 BMI: 35 to 40 kg/m2 

 Possible symptoms: Sleep apnea, shortness of breath

Grade III obesity status! 

 BMI: greater than 40 kg/m2 

 Possible symptoms: Reflux, difficulty moving, bedsores, diabetes, heart attack, stroke

You are very underweight! 

 BMI: 0,09 to 19,19 kg/m2 
\n Possible symptoms: Hair loss, infertility, menstrual absence

You are underweight! 

 BMI: 19,19 to 25,89 kg/m2 

 Possible symptoms: Fatigue, stress, anxiety

You are at the perfect weight! 

 BMI: 25,89 to 27,39 kg/m2 

 Positives: Lower risk of heart and vascular disease

" Are you overweight! 

 BMI: 27,89 to 32,39 kg/m2 

 Possible symptoms: Fatigue, poor circulation, varicose veins"

Grade I obesity status! 

 BMI: 32,39 to 34,99 kg/m2 

 Possible symptoms: Diabetes, angina, heart attack, atherosclerosis

Grade II obesity status! 

 BMI: 35,09 to 39,99 kg/m2 

 Possible symptoms: Sleep apnea, shortness of breath

Grade III obesity status! 

 BMI: greater than 40 kg/m2 

 Possible symptoms: Reflux, difficulty moving, bedsores, diabetes, heart attack, stroke
